veg_layer.title: Vegetation descriptor layer
veg_layer.description: The vegetation descriptor layer categorizes land cover into green and non-green areas. Green vegetation includes both natural vegetation and vegetation resulting from anthropic activity (e.g. crops, afforestation, etc.). Non-green areas include very sparsely vegetated areas, bare land, water, permanent ice/snow and urban areas.</br></br> This module computes a vegetation descriptor layer using a land use/land cover map as an input. You have the option to use a custom land use/land cover map for your country. If not available, the tool will use a land cover time series produced by the European Space Agency (ESA) under the Climate Change Initiative (CCI) (Available at: http://maps.elie.ucl.ac.be/CCI/viewer/index.php)

mountain_layer.title: Mountain descriptor layer
mountain_layer.description:
SDG Indicator 15.4.2 – Mountain Green Cover Index defines mountains in accordance with the UNEP-WCMC global mountain classification (Kapos et al. 2000). This method classifies mountains according to the following scheme:

  • Class 1: elevation ≥ 4 500 m
  • Class 2: elevation 3 500–4 500 m
  • Class 3: elevation 2 500–3 500 m
  • Class 4: elevation 1 500–2 500 m and slope ≥ 2°
  • Class 5: elevation 1 000–1 500 m and slope ≥ 5° or LER (Local Elevation Range in the radius of 7 kilometers) > 300 m
  • Class 6: elevation 300–1 000 m and LER (Local Elevation Range in the radius of 7 kilometers) > 300 m

This module computes a UNEP-WCMC mountain class map using a Digital Elevation Model (DEM) as an input. You have the option to use a custom DEM for your country. If not available, the tool will use a global UNEP-WCMC mountain classification map produced from [To be defined] at a [To be defined] m resolution.

desc.k3: Where elevation is between 2,500 and 3,500 meters
desc.k4: Where elevation is between 1,500 and 2,500 meters and the slope is greather than 2%
desc.k5: Where elevation is between 1,000 and 1,500 meters and the slope is greather tan 5% or local elevation range (LER 7km radius) is over 300 meters
desc.k6: Where elevation is between 300 and 1,000 meters and local elevation range (7km radius) is over 300 meters
